tool_description: Analyzes existing knowledge base articles to assess content quality, readability, completeness, and identifies areas needing updates based on various metrics and criteria.

article_ids.description: List of knowledge base article IDs to analyze

analysis_type.description: Type of analysis to perform: readability, completeness, freshness, or comprehensive

include_metrics.description: Specific metrics to include in analysis

error_messages: Invalid article IDs: One or more article IDs do not exist in the knowledge base.
Unsupported analysis type: Use one of [readability, completeness, freshness, comprehensive].
Analysis limit exceeded: Maximum 50 articles can be analyzed in a single request.
Invalid metrics requested: Check that all requested metrics are supported.
usage: Provide article_ids and analysis_type to assess content quality. Optionally specify include_metrics for targeted analysis. Results help identify which articles need updates or revisions.

analysis_summary.description: Overall summary of the content analysis results

article_scores.description: Quality scores for each analyzed article (0-100 scale)

recommendations.description: Specific improvement recommendations for each article

priority_articles.description: Article IDs that require immediate attention
